name: ON SALE! The Diva Rider Daily Journal
description: Take a journey, grab your bike and explore your world and the world around you. Excellent tips and techniques, record your great riding days, great quotes and practical tips on how to live out loud. Over 180 pages! Coil bound. Makes a great gift – start recording your ride today – a keepsake for years to come! ISBN 1-4120-9403-8 Kelly Patterson McGrath
